title: Ep106: Gothas and Zeppelins over Britain 1917-18
itunes:title: Ep106: Gothas and Zeppelins over Britain 1917-18
itunes:subtitle: Pete and Gary continue their story of the air war over Britain in the First World War, with the story of Gotha bombers and Zeppelin raids in 1917 and 1918. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more...
description:
Pete and Gary continue their story of the air war over Britain in the First World War, with the story of Gotha bombers and Zeppelin raids in 1917 and 1918.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
